description:
After The Walking Dead left viewers with a devastating midseason finale, the show returns with “What’s Happening and What’s Going On,” picking up with the survivors after the hospital tragedy that left one of their own dead.《行尸走肉》第四季在冬歇前给了观众们相当沉痛的一击，观众们急切地想知道在发生医院沉痛的一幕之后，接下来会发生什么，剧情将会如何发展。

In this new look at the episode’s first two minutes, Rick tells the other survivors that they may be going on what could be one last long trip, though as viewers have come to learn, the journey is never really over. 在最新发布的全新第四季2分钟全新片段中，Rick跟其他幸存者说，这次可能是他们最后一次长途旅行，通过这句话观众们可以知道，这次旅行远远没有结束。

The Walking Dead returns on Feb. 8 to resume its fifth season. 《行尸走肉》将会在2月8日回归第五季后半季。
